title: Bastard Out of Carolina / Two or Three Things I Know For Sure
description: For anyone who has ever felt the contempt of a self-righteous world, this book will resonate within you like a gospel choir. For anyone who hasn't, this book will be an education. Dorothy Allison has elegantly unpretentious style, raw intensity, and a great big heart. In Bastard out of Carolina she tells a horrific story without malice or self-pity. I read her work in admiration and respect.
author: Dorothy Allison
